title: Emercy 2019 Grenache-Cabernet Sauvignon-Petite Sirah Red (Santa Barbara County)
description: Fresh and yet very opulent aromas of black and red cherry meet with light caramel and chai spice on the nose of this blend of 52% Grenache, 42% Cabernet Sauvignon and 6% Petite Sirah. Fresh and crisp berry flavors pop on the palate, aided by healthy doses of dried herb and dark spice.

title: Center of Effort 2020 Effort Rosé of Grenache (Edna Valley)
description: Rose petals, light pluot and a hint of spearmint on the nose make for very crisp aromas in this Grenache-based rosé. There's tremendous texture to the palate, giving a grippy edge to the softer, fresh flavors of strawberry and watermelon.

title: Clementine Carter 2019 Larner Grenache (Ballard Canyon)
description: A light shade in the glass, this bottling pops on the nose with dried cherry, pomegranate and rose-petal aromas, with just the slightest hint of game lingering beneath. Bouncy fruit flavors of red punch zip across the acid-driven sip, where a grippy structure leads into a finish where dark-spice elements arise.

title: Fess Parker 2019 Ashley's Pinot Noir (Sta. Rita Hills)
description: Clean and approachable aromas of cherry and spice cake make for a familiar and delicious entry to the nose of this wine. The palate shows darker cherry flavors as well as plenty of clove and mace, surrounding a mouthfeel that is very full without being too rich.

title: Ryan Cochrane 2018 Solomon Hills Vineyard Chardonnay (Santa Maria Valley)
description: Aromas of lemon peel, Gravenstein apple and struck stone light up the nose of this bottling. The palate is quite tense and stony, but also generous in flavors of lemon cream and crisp yellow apple.

title: Crū 2019 Solomon Hills Vineyard Pommard Clone Pinot Noir (Santa Maria Valley)
description: This is a vibrant and lively wine from an exciting vineyard. Aromas of raspberry sorbet, sage and white pepper lead the nose into a bright and zippy palate that's full of cranberry, plum and lingering cracked pepper flavors.
